ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Intense seminar that gives an in depth review of a variety of topics relating to B cells. I would recommend it to another student as even though I didn't find the topic to be completely interesting, at the very least my critical reading/thinking skills were greatly improved after the course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course was extremely effective in deepening my understanding of the field of B cell biology, and was invaluable in helping me build a general knowledge base which will serve me well in my immunology thesis.

It didn't help much in the way of actual knowledge but was very helpful in that I am much better in being able to determine the strengths and weaknesses of papers that I read that are related to my research.
